block.p: Cecilia Pohorille, a daughter of Aida Pohorille and Dr. Raul Pohorille of New Rochelle, N.Y., was married yesterday to Greg Joseph McCall, a son of Yvonne and Amiel Joseph McCall of Sudbury, Mass. The Rev. Louis J. Mazza performed the ceremony at Immaculate Conception Roman Catholic Church in Sleepy Hollow, N.Y.

The bride, 31, is a senior counsel for the PanAmSat Corporation, a satellite communications company in Greenwich, Conn. She graduated from Wesleyan University and the New York University School of Law. Her father is a surgeon practicing in Jackson Heights, Queens. He also has a practice in the Bronx, which the bride's mother manages.

Cecilia Pohorille, a daughter of Aida Pohorille and Dr. Raul Pohorille of New Rochelle, N.Y., was married yesterday to Greg Joseph McCall, a son of Yvonne and Amiel Joseph McCall of Sudbury, Mass. The Rev. Louis J. Mazza performed the ceremony at Immaculate Conception Roman Catholic Church in Sleepy Hollow, N.Y.

The bride, 31, is a senior counsel for the PanAmSat Corporation, a satellite communications company in Greenwich, Conn. She graduated from Wesleyan University and the New York University School of Law. Her father is a surgeon practicing in Jackson Heights, Queens. He also has a practice in the Bronx, which the bride's mother manages.

The bridegroom, 32, is a managing director for technology at Westway Capital, an investment company in Westport, Conn. He graduated cum laude from the University of Massachusetts at Amherst. His father is the chief executive and founder of Golf Technologies, a manufacturer of remote-controlled golf-bag carts in Natick, Mass.
